column1: 4$Condition: Other$2/6/2010 8:29:14 PM$Reviewer: epoole59, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $5$5$5$I have been using Lexapro for several years to treat Panic Attacts I have had for all of my teen and adult life. It took years until I found Lexapro that helped. But after many years of use
column3: so my doctor added this patch to assist in controlling my attacts. IT has worked wonderfully
column4: stopped my hand tremmors and racing heart. IT also helps with my MS pain levels a bit and headachs I get from IVIG treatments monthly.

column1: I have no problem keeping the patch on at all. Just make sure the area is cleaned with a alchol wipe first
column2: dried and secured without touching the sticky side of patch before putting it on spot you desire. Note
column3: I also take Xanax 1 mg 2 X daily if needed
column4: mainly at night and have found I do not need as often sense I use the patch
column5: nor my pain medicine as often. Stress can often make chronic pain worse and this patch does help mine.

column3: seem to want to nap more often
column4: but do not feel drugged which is nice. I do not like feeling drugged and want to always have my wits about me. "
